mapper.insert: insert into activity_discount ( id, name, sku_id, max_buy_quantity, price, sort_order, description, begin_time, end_time, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime )values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{skuId}, #{maxBuyQuantity}, #{price}, #{sortOrder}, #{description}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{creator}, #{ctime}, #{modifier}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update:
update activity_discount
id=#{id},
name=#{name},
sku_id=#{skuId},
max_buy_quantity=#{maxBuyQuantity},
price=#{price},
sort_order=#{sortOrder},
description=#{description},
begin_time=#{beginTime},
end_time=#{endTime},
creator=#{creator},
ctime=#{ctime},
modifier=#{modifier},
mtime=#{mtime},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, sku_id, max_buy_quantity, price, sort_order, description, begin_time, end_time, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from activity_discount where id=#{id}
select id, name, sku_id, max_buy_quantity, price, sort_order, description, begin_time, end_time, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from activity_discount where id=#{id}

select id, name, sku_id, max_buy_quantity, price, sort_order, description, begin_time, end_time, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime
limit #{offset},#{rows}
